ref: 8534 *pratañcā ʻ bowstring ʼ. [Cf. patañcikā -- f. ʻ id. ʼ lex., pratyañcā -- f. HŚS 2230, pataṅgikā -- f. Apte. -- Prob. of non -- Aryan origin]
N. parĩjo ʻ pocket between strings of pellet -- bow to hold shot when being fired, forked stick of a sling ʼ (rather than with ND 365 b 34 < *pratijya -- ʻ near the bowstring ʼ).
